Wisdom: لَا تُحَقِّرَنَّ صَغَائِرَ الْآثَامِ فَإِنَّهَا الْمُوبِقَاتُ وَمَنْ أَحَاطَتْ بِهِ مُحَقَّرَاتُهُ أَهْلَكَتْهُ
enWisdom: Those who remain behind [in this world after others have passed away before them] do not stop from committing sins

Wisdom: أَشَدُّ الذُّنُوبِ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ ذَنْبٌ اسْتَهَانَ بِهِ رَاكِبُهُ
enWisdom: The gravest of sins in the sight of Allah, the Glorified, is the sin which is taken lightly by the one who commits it

Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ الذُّنُوبِ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ ذَنْبٌ صَغُرَ عِنْدَ صَاحِبِهِ
enWisdom: The worst of sins in the sight of Allah is the sin upon which its doer persists

Wisdom: تَهْوِينُ الذَّنْبِ أَعْظَمُ مِنْ رُكُوبِ الذَّنْبِ
enWisdom: Taking a sin lightly is worse than committing the sin
The one who embarks upon sin, his [final] abode is hellfire

Wisdom: تَأْتِينَا أَشْيَاءُ نَسْتَكْثِرُهَا إِذَا جَمَعْنَاهَا وَنَسْتَقِلُّهَا إِذَا قَسَمْنَاهَا
enWisdom: Things come to us that seem to be much when we amass them but which we consider to be less when we divide them
